definition: lack of discipline/to break a rule/to violate discipline/to breach a principle
to disobey/to violate/to separate/to go against

sentences.english: In the first part , it dissects formational reasons of people"s polices violating the law and discipline in public security organs ."
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，剖析公安民警違法違紀行爲的成因。

sentences.english: Involved in serious violations of law, the transfer of the judiciary.
sentences.chinese: 涉及嚴重違法違紀行爲的，移交司法部門處理。

sentences.english: In recent years there is an increasing tendency for this group to violate laws and regulations.
sentences.chinese: 近年來，在這個羣體中，違法違紀現象有增加的趨勢。

sentences.english: They never violate the rules behind the pickets' back.
sentences.chinese: 他們從不背著糾察隊做違紀的事。

sentences.english: We will make investigating and prosecuting major violations of the law and discipline an important task in the ?ght against corruption.
sentences.chinese: 要把查處違法違紀大案要案，作爲反腐敗的重要任務。

sentences.english: Safety not to touch the red line, unsparing violation.
sentences.chinese: 安全紅線不能碰，違章違紀不留情。

sentences.english: The violation of the law and discipline by rural cadres discredit party's image among masses.
sentences.chinese: 鄉村幹部的違紀違法現象敗壞了黨在羣衆中的形象。

sentences.english: We will make investigating and prosecuting major violations of the law and discipline an important task in the fight against corruption.
sentences.chinese: 要把查處違法違紀大案要案，作爲反腐敗的重要任務。

sentences.english: Having any other irregularity or discipline breach and causing any unfavorable impact and consequence.
sentences.chinese: 有其他違法違紀行爲並造成不良影響和後果的。
剽竅是嚴重的違紀行爲。

sentences.english: He also feels the FA should speed up their disciplinary procedures.
sentences.chinese: 溫特也認爲足總應該加快他們有關違紀的聽證效率。

sentences.english: That is the infraction was serious enough to necessitate termination.
sentences.chinese: 即違紀行爲是否嚴重到需要解僱。

sentences.english: The public universities' punishment rules to disobedient students belong to the administrative laws.
sentences.chinese: 公立高校學生違紀處分規則屬行政法規範。

sentences.english: How to punish the students broken the rules is an important part of the internal management in high school.
sentences.chinese: 對違紀學生進行紀律處分是高等學校管理的重要內容。

definition: to discipline sb/to punish/disciplinary action/to deal with (a matter)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to hold accountable/to blame/to censure/to apportion blame
to bring to justice/to hand over to the law
